lead_paragraph: Analysts said Kors’s rapid expansion had led to brand fatigue among shoppers.

headline.print_headline: Michael Kors Shares Fall After Weak Revenue Report
headline.main: Michael Kors Shares Fall After Weak Revenue Report

snippet: Analysts said Kors’s rapid expansion had led to brand fatigue among shoppers.
abstract: Michael Kors Holdings reports increase in fourth-quarter revenue of 17.8 percent, slowest growth since company went public in December 2011; North American same-store sales dipped 6.7 percent, signaling that consumers may be experiencing brand fatigue after label's rapid expansion.
